name: Shooter Fun
description:
This wasn't supposed to turn into anything, but if the concept is fun I may just continue on it.  If you enjoyed it let me know as this will help me determine if I actually polish, change out some models and continue work on it.

** This is also a WIP **

If enough people like this silly Idea I will keep adding new features until then it's silly and don't take it seriously.

Controls:

W A S D:      Movement keys

Mouse:        Look Left Mouse:   Shoot Right Mouse:  Zoom in

R: To reload

**** Pickups

- There are health packs as red boxes on the ground. Each pack gives you, or the AI, 25 hp back to a max of 100

- In order to change the round time you HAVE to click on the SET button next to the time field. The round time will accept decimal numbers so if you want a game to last 30 seconds you just put 0.5 as the round time.

- Pressing ESC will show and hide your mouse on screen.

- AI names can be added or changed in the Names.txt file located at: ShooterFun v0.3\Shooter_Data *Note: must have at least one name and yes spaces blank lines will be read as a name.  The first name in the file is the players name.

- When you get shot or bumped into it will make you start to spin depending on the level of impact.
